home-carousal-title: Enjoy the strongest discounts on all lessons (50% discount for the first subscription)
carousal-p-2: Presents Prices and offers that suit everyone for all educational lessons, up to 50%.
platform-p-1: Learn and review all the lessons of the Ministerial Curriculum with a clear and simplified explanation in an innovative and intelligent way that helps the student understand the lessons in an enjoyable and unique educational way.
platform-p-2: With one subscription for the semester in Arabic and English, get multiple access without end during the entire semester for all recorded lessons.
lessons-p-1: Fanar platform offers recorded lessons for the UAE ministerial curriculum from the eighth grade to the twelfth grade in the general and advanced forms, in both Arabic and English.
lessons-p-2: There are many sweets and technological tools for a unique educational experience that is different from traditional education, as it enables the teacher and student to apply distance education in the best way to reach the best educational outcomes through an easy-to-use and multi-functional interactive platform.
parents-panel-p: We help parents and guardians monitor the student through a control platform where the student's progress in the curriculum can be seen.
recorded-lessons-p: Multiple access allows you to attend all lessons for the semester in scientific subjects
online-lessons-p: The student can book a private lesson and follow up with the teacher of the preferred subject through online classes.
our-cons1-p: The student can watch the first free lesson of each subject to learn about the teacher’s style and method of explanation
our-cons2-p: Fanar platform covers the government curricula for scientific subjects for the three semesters
our-cons3-p: The procedures for accepting teachers at Fanar are strict, and we go through several stages to ensure the competence of teachers. We also create tools to report any problem
our-cons4-p: It is possible to access educational materials Fanar from the browser or smart devices, as well as through smart applications on Android and Apple devices.
our-cons5-p: The Fanar platform was designed to be accessible to everyone at nominal prices for the entire semester, with offers and discounts throughout the academic period
our-cons6-p: The Fanar platform provides interactive recorded videos and an infographic feature that allows the student to understand the lesson from the first time in a fun and enjoyable way.
our-cons7-p: The procedures for accepting teachers at Fanar are strict and go through several stages to ensure the competence of teachers. There are also tools to report any problem.
our-cons8-p: Keep the contents of previous lessons and refer to them at any time
download-app-p: Contact us to change your life with private lessons today

faq_p_1: Fanar Educational Platform is an online educational platform that provides comprehensive detailed explanations of all scientific curricula, lessons and questions regarding the organizational structures of the ministerial curricula for the general and advanced courses in Arabic and English using the best digital solutions.
faq_h_2: What category does the Fanar educational platform target?
faq_p_2: Fanar is an electronic platform directed to students from grade 9 to grade 12, general and advanced, in the government education sector in the United Arab Emirates. It also targets students who are not registered in any form of formal education, along with parents, teachers, various educational institutions, and all those who wish. With knowledge.
faq_h_3: What can I learn at Fanar?
faq_p_3: Fanar platform includes educational videos and explanations in mathematics, physics, chemistry, and general sciences
faq_h_4: What are the educational levels included in Fanar videos?
faq_p_4: Fanar platform videos cover the educational levels starting from the ninth grade until the twelfth grade
faq_h_5: Are the lessons on the Fanar platform live lessons or recorded lessons?
faq_p_5: The lessons on the Fanar platform are recorded lessons (online) and there will be a way to download the lessons (offline). There are also direct lessons between the teacher and the student that take place through the platform itself.
faq_h_6: Are the live lessons via Zoom?
faq_p_6: Lessons will be conducted through the platform using the Zoom program, as the platform is linked to the Zoom application in a way that makes it easy for the student and teacher to access the lesson
faq_h_7: Are the teachers on the Fanar platform specialized?
faq_p_7: Yes, they are specialists and have more than 10 years of experience in the field
faq_h_8: Can I watch a free lesson on the platform?
faq_p_8: Yes, the first lesson is always a free trial with the teacher in a specific subject, and then the student registers for paid lessons after that
faq_h_9: Is there an explanation of the lessons in Arabic?
faq_p_9: Yes, there is an explanation in Arabic
faq_h_10: Can I watch educational videos in a language other than Arabic?
faq_p_10: Fanar platform specializes in providing educational materials and videos in the Arabic language in the general course and in Arabic and English in the advanced course, as it aims to enrich scientific educational content in the Arabic language.
faq_h_11: How can I register on the Fanar platform as a student?
faq_p_11: By clicking on the Create an Account button or through the link  https://www.fanar.ae/sign_up • Type the full name • Enter your email • Enter a password • Enter confirm password • Click on create account
faq_p_12: All videos are subject to intellectual property rights, and can be viewed on the Fanar platform only
faq_p_13: Featured on Fanar is Fanar's honor list. It is a way for us to express our gratitude to the users who spend their time competing and giving their time to Fanar. You can top the list and raise your name by collecting points.

instructor_page_what_we_look_for: What we look for in our tutors
instructor_page_employment_process_p: Our tutors undergo a thorough recruitment cycle before joining our community.
instructor_page_employment_process_1: Submit your application on Fanar website
instructor_page_employment_process_2: Our HR team will validate your information and qualifications
instructor_page_employment_process_3: Take an assessment test and get interviewed
instructor_page_testmonial_header: "Sara has improved dramatically in Maths. Your tutors are fantastic. They truly stand out."
instructor_page_q_1: What are the qualifications to become a tutor at Fanar?
instructor_page_p_1: To become a tutor at Fanar, you must have a relevant academic degree, teaching certification, and teaching experience. We also look for candidates who are passionate about education, have excellent communication skills, and are committed to helping students achieve their academic goals.
instructor_page_p_2: We are looking for tutors who can teach a wide range of subjects, including mathematics, science, English, Arabic, social studies, and more. If you have expertise in a particular subject and a passion for teaching, we would love to hear from you.
instructor_page_q_3: How do I apply to become a tutor?
instructor_page_p_3: To become a tutor at Fanar , simply visit our website and fill out the online application form. Be sure to include your resume, teaching certifications, and references. We will review your application and contact you if we think you would be a good fit to join our tutors community.
